SQL.LOAD: SELECT question_list_id as question_list_id, code, description, effective, expiration, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by FROM Elita.elp_question_list WHERE question_list_id = :question_list_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT QUESTION_LIST_ID AS QUESTION_LIST_ID, CODE, DESCRIPTION, to_Char(EFFECTIVE,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EFFECTIVE, to_Char(EXPIRATION,'DD-Mon-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS EXPIRATION FROM Elita.ELP_QUESTION_LIST WHERE rownum < '101' AND created_date <> SYSDATE --dynamic_where_clause ORDER BY Code, Expiration
SQL.GET_GROUP_COMPANIES: SELECT company_id FROM elp_company WHERE COMPANY_GROUP_ID = :company_group_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_question_list SET code = :code, description = :description, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE question_list_id = :question_list_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_question_list ( code, description, effective, expiration, created_by, question_list_id ) VALUES ( :code, :description, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :question_list_id )
SQL.DELETE: UPDATE ELP_QUESTION_LIST SET EXPIRATION = SYSDATE WHERE QUESTION_LIST_ID = :QUESTION_LIST_ID
SQL.IS_LIST_ASSIGNED_TO_DEALER: SELECT DEALER_ID FROM ELITA.ELP_DEALER WHERE ((SELECT EFFECTIVE FROM ELP_EQUIPMENT_LIST WHERE EQUIPMENT_LIST_ID = :EQUIPMENT_LIST_ID) <= SYSDATE)
SQL.CHECK_OVERLAP: SELECT * FROM ELITA.ELP_QUESTION_LIST WHERE rownum < '101' AND QUESTION_LIST_ID <> :QUESTION_LIST_ID --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.CHECK_LIST_OVERLAP_TO_EXPIRE: SELECT * FROM ELP_QUESTION_LIST WHERE rownum < '101' AND QUESTION_LIST_ID <> :QUESTION_LIST_ID --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.CHECK_OVERLAP_DURATION: SELECT * FROM ELP_QUESTION_LIST WHERE rownum < '101' AND QUESTION_LIST_ID <> :QUESTION_LIST_ID --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.EXPIRE_LIST: UPDATE ELP_QUESTION_LIST SET EXPIRATION = :EXPIRATION WHERE QUESTION_LIST_ID = :QUESTION_LIST_ID
SQL.DROPDOWN_ID: select list_id from elp_list where code = :code
SQL.DROPDOWN_ITEM_ID: select list_item_id from elp_list_item where code =:code and list_id=:list_id
